original_text: So they laid hands on her; and she went through the horses' entrance to the king's house, and there she was put to death.
korean_text: 이에 그의 길을 열어 주매 그가 왕궁의 말이 다니는 길로 가다가 거기서 죽임을 당하였더라

sentences.original_text: So they laid hands on her
and she went through the horses' entrance
and there she was put to death
